title: Obituary: Carolyn “Connie” Wilson / Building legacy of art and storytelling
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
Carolyn “Connie” Wilson had an exuberance for life that came through whether she was teaching, painting or writing. Her penchant for the...
